website_summaries.verdict: This set is attractive to children and the pieces are constructed with toddlers in mind, but cleanup requires a gentle touch.
pros: Comes with a cute Disney theme that most kids will love
Deep bowl and compartmentalized plate come with a fork and spoon
Free of BPA and other harmful chemicals
Bowl and plate are dishwasher and microwave safe
cons: Some parents gripe about the graphics pealing off, especially if scrubbed or washed in the dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my youngest grandson because I had gotten his older brother a similar set from another source and wanted them to be somewhat alike. The set I bought the older grandson is over 3 years old, is used at least 5 days a week, and looks very good. I just started using this set recently and it already looks older than the other set. I used a butter knife to cut up pancakes today and the butter knife scratched the plate! Very flimsy and of a poor quality plastic. I would not buy it again and, in fact, am already looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Pezzy

customer_reviews.title: NOT dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: This product says it's dishwasher safe. It is NOT. I put it in the dishwasher, top rack, and a film on the plate bubbled quite a bit (see pictures). It is not a film that's meant to be removed before use.
customer_reviews.author: ChrissaH

customer_reviews.title: UNSAFE.  Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Please do not order this for your child. Within 3 uses, the image started bubbling and peeling off. This is NOT SAFE for children. The quality is very cheap and my child could have ingested this. Again, this should not be intended for food usage. I did not even use my dishwasher or microwave - only washed by hand.
customer_reviews.author: B. M.

customer_reviews.title: Sticker flakes off
customer_reviews.text: Some of the edge decoration must have gotten in the plate during the manufacturing process. When I took it out of the package to wash, I felt something rough and bumpy over the back wheel of the yellow car. As I washed it the sticker started to flake off! I certainly do not want to let my child eat off of a plate that has flaking sticker pieces on it! Too bad, Cars is his favorite. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa A.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Mickey lover!
customer_reviews.text: The fork is so dull my son is unable to independently pick up his own meat. You really have to stab it to get the meat onto the prongs of fork. See photos. The Mickey fork included with set. The other fork was a toddler set I purchased separately. You’ll be able to see the difference in fork prongs and quality. Cute set but, personally wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Richards

customer_reviews.title: This is the second time I have purchased this set ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased this set and th plastic has come away from the plate trapping water underneath and I had to throw it away. I won’t be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Cute set
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the cars movie so we ordered this set. It's a nice set but the plastic film wore off of the plate after washing it in the dishwasher several times (like a year's worth of washing it). I think part of the blame is on my husband for not putting it on the top rack, but I also know that other plates were have don't have the plastic film. The spoon and fork are really nice and don't seem to have an issue in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: kersky22

customer_reviews.title: Cute but plate can be bigger.
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my kids one Mickey and one Minnie and thought it was so cute. Somehow they weren’t impressed with the shape. The fork is more like a spoon so it couldn’t really fork the food but just spoon it. One time my daughter put sauce on the ears but she felt it was too little sauce and keep refilling. I think the war space is a good space to put little pieces of food. We put broccoli there once and she kept refilling with was a success.
customer_reviews.author: MTsang

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute plate and bowl until you wash it. After just one hand wash the sticker at the bottom of the plate and the bowl bubble up. So you have to rip the sticker off or you can’t clean it properly. Then it leaves behind a glue residue. By the time you get the glue residue off it leaves you with a blank plate and bowl. Don’t waste your money. I wish we never wasted our money.
customer_reviews.author: HCH

customer_reviews.title: My daughter absolutely loved getting this set as a gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loved getting this set as a gift. The colors are true. I only have two complaints. One, the fork isn't sharp enough to get her food on there. So she hasn't used the fork much at all. And two, grease clings to the plate and bowl like you wouldn't believe. I have to let it soak with dawn overnight to get the greasy feeling out. Other than those to things I am by far a satisfied customer and will be buying more sets for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coating bubbles
customer_reviews.text: This started off as a great plate and bowl set. The ears on the plate are the perfect size for dips and the bowl is nice and deep. However, after a few months of use and placing in the dishwasher, the coating on the plate and bowl is bubbling and the color on the bowl is also "chipping off". I think it's now unsafe for my daughter to use. This actually is also the second set we've purchased. I was hoping that the first set was sort of a "one off" but it's actually happened to both. Although I love the size of the set, I would not buy it again for the length of time we can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Malexe

customer_reviews.title: Quality/Durability isnt good
customer_reviews.text: The product is listed as dishwasher safe but after a few washes, the plastic coating is bubbling. Definitely dont feel safe serving food to my toddler on this. Throwing it away...
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: UNBREAKABLE! Easy to hold and cute, too.
customer_reviews.text: I like these for two reasons: ONE: they are 100% unbreakable, unlike most kids' plastic tableware. I have concrete floors, and we have broken every other type of plastic ware. TWO: the little handles/ears make these very easy to grip, even for older kids. Only negative: the decals will eventually wear off. Wash carefully by hand.
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Cute design, but it’s all decals stuck onto plates. These stickers start to come off and water got under them. Kind of gross. There is some “paint” for some of the design and this started scraping off within a couple of months. The silverware is all we have left. The other stuff is in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and not very functional for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Cup cover does not stay on cup and lip of cup is very short. Toddler has already spilled many drinks. The fork does not pick up the food well and the spoon is too flat. Very expensive set for items that are not functional
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Stickers come off. Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: After couple of weeks of using it. The stickers are starting to come off. We dont use dishwasher or hot water to clean and wash dishes. Bad quality
customer_reviews.author: David Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Not durable or safe at all!
customer_reviews.text: This plate is cute, but after a few months of occasional use the image is all bubbled and peeling off. I had to throw it away since I’m past the return window. It never went in the dishwasher or microwave and was really only used for snacks. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sjmama3

customer_reviews.title: My son loves Lightning McQueen, but the plate set...eh
customer_reviews.text: So my son loves McQueen. The plate is ok. I don't like the way it's sectioned off. You can't really get much into the top "arrow" section. The bowl is too deep for a small kid to use. Utensils are really small. It is an ok buy, but I would have chosen a different set that had more functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Mom

customer_reviews.title: Plastic coating peels away
customer_reviews.text: I've only run this through the dishwasher a few times and always on the top rack. The plastic coating is bubbling up and I have to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Disney Mickey Mouse Feeding Set!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Disney Baby Mickey Mouse 4-Piece Feeding Set as a Christmas gift for my son. It came as advertised, packaged well and it shipped very quickly. It contains a Mickey Mouse plate, a bowl, and a fork & spoon just as pictured. I am so happy I purchased this plate for my son, I also got one for my niece for Christmas as well. I highly recommend this seller and this wonderful toddler feeding set!! I included a picture of this great set next to my tv remote just so you can get an idea of the size of the bowl and plates.
customer_reviews.author: Amberlini Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: Since we need our baby to learn to self feed more and she was in the loving Minnie Mouse phase, I got this bowl plate set in hope to get her more interested. The pictures are really nice, but the plate, spoon and fork are way too small. The bowl is only good for fruits. If i cut up an English muffin (half size) in small bites, it would barely fit into the plate so we ended up just using her other previous suction plate that we bought a while back. Only just use the bowl for fruits.
customer_reviews.author: BANANAPPLE

customer_reviews.title: Have been using for months, great!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this product for almost 6 months now and all of the items are still in great shape, even after being washed in the washing machine. All of the items are durable, and our child loves that it has Minnie Mouse on them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher friendly
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if they specify they aren’t washable, but the graphic sticker on one bubbled up after a few washes and I had to throw it out. Dishwashers are a must for any child plate, so only recommend if you don’t plan to use the dishwasher for them.
customer_reviews.author: Sturnstyle

customer_reviews.title: Looks and durability!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves cars so this was naturally a hit, I just wish the spoon was a tad bit bigger and the plate designed with a bit more space in mind. Other then that no color has washed off yet and its been through quite a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: poor product design -- Unsafe to use after only a couple of months!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two plates on 11/19 to give as Christmas 2017 gifts. We washed the plates on the top shelf of the dishwasher as directed, but the plates plastic is "bubbling" and peeling off, so I do not think that this product is safe for my Grandson to continue to use. I am very disappointed and wish that I had read the reviews before purchasing as the return window for this product closed on 2/27/2018 and today is 04/14/2018. I would NOT buy this product again! The First Years Disney/Pixar Cars 4-Piece Feeding Set
customer_reviews.author: Charles N or Karen Jones

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one
customer_reviews.text: Prior to opening this item, I noticed the paint was already partially scratched off the item. Received a refund from Amazon instructing me to throw it out. Before doing so, I opened the package and ran my finger along the dish. My finger came away all dirty with the paint used on the item image. Clearly, there was a manufacturing issue with this item. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy of Oz

customer_reviews.title: The set is perfect for a little toddler learning to use dishes and ...
customer_reviews.text: This dish set is so cute and the colors, pictures are so vibrate and well done. The set is perfect for a little toddler learning to use dishes and silverware. Four-piece set includes plate, bowl, fork and spoon. They are dishwasher safe and clean up really nicely. The price for this dish set is very reasonable for what you get in the set. My granddaughter just loves this dish set, especially since it had minnie mouse on them.
customer_reviews.author: snhander

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage. In less than a month of only hand washing the images are almost gone. Looks terrible, I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JoshAndLinds

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy dish set
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this set for my son almost 8 years ago. My daughter fell in love with it but the old set was fading. I found the same exact set and gave it to her for Christmas! She loved it! It’s sturdy and bright. Excellent buy
customer_reviews.author: Larrissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son loves this set. And so do it. The plate is perfect for carrots and dip or nuggets and ketchup. Bowl is perfect size for a toddlers bowl of cereal. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PreciousCargo4

customer_reviews.title: The price is great! The dinner set is very  cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my GreatGrandson who turned one for his Birthday! Disney products are a big hit at there house. My Oldest GreatGrandson who is two, saw that his Brother got this for a gift. Took it away& said mine!! Needless to say GreatGrandma will buy another set for the one year old! It is very cute set!!
customer_reviews.author: BJS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and cute set
customer_reviews.text: Super cute set, my daughter loves eating in it. My only complain is that the ears on the plate are too small to place food sides. You can only fit really small amount of food. I wish they were a little bit smaller even if you would reduce the size of the main dish. Overall a very sturdy and well made product. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: WTCB

customer_reviews.title: Small scratch in letter
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to open this because my son is obsessed with Mickey! I washed it with warm water to clean it and I noticed a letter has what seems to be a scratch in the letter to T. My son won’t even notice but I just noticed it when washing it for the first time ....still love the set of plates and silverware!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very cute child eat set
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little set my daughter loves them! For and spoon are metal and not plastic which I like a lot. Have had for well over a year now and the images have started to wear a little bit do to cutting stuff up inside it and hand washing and dish washing but overall still in great shape and she still loves them!
customer_reviews.author: sj0524

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: The prints are really nice and shiny, but the plastic is very thin, and light! When I put the on the dinning table, the plate moves a lots, not recommended for young kids!
customer_reviews.author: JJC

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last long
customer_reviews.text: These were just ok. My son is obsessed with the cars movie so I was excited to get these for him. But after maybe a month of use, the plastic on the image all started to peel off and I had to get rid of them. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Poore

customer_reviews.title: Disney Toddler plate set
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors of Disney of Mickey Mouse. I do wish the bowl was a little bigger but it will still get a lot of use for our grandson! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: J. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Plastic coating wrinkled after using
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item on June 3, 2020 for our grandson. Haven't used it much, but the coating on the large plate has become wrinkled and is lifting off the plate. Doesn't look like a good product for out grandchild! Would ndot purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: they are still in perfect brand-new condition
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my one year old grandson in January. The plate is bubbling up and appears unsafe for my grandson to use. Is this a defect.? It was in dishwasher, top rack only, probably no more than 5 times. is it possible to get a replacement plate? I have purchased other kids plastic divider plates and have actually had them for about 9 years. they have been washed a million times in the dishwasher and even on the bottom rack. they are still in perfect brand-new condition!!!! will you replace this plate for a second try?
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lovati

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves this. Huge Mickey Mouse fan, and this was perfect for him. He gets excited to eat. Was initially worried about the fork however it was relatively safe in his age. Would use with caution though
customer_reviews.author: Zev Lati

customer_reviews.title: NOT Safe for the Dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in this plate. It says dishwasher safe (top rack). I've run it through twice and a bubble in the plastic screened on picture has emerged. If it's NOT going to be dishwasher safe/durable, then it should not say it is. Can't return it since we've used it, but buyer beware, these are unlikely to hold up to actual kids using them.
customer_reviews.author: Limbersay

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this plate set. I wish I could replace the utensils though - unfortunately the company does not make the exact spoon and fork as replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Durable
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this set. He uses it daily. We’ve hand washed it and put it in the dishwasher a few times and the printing on it has not scratched a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Nice an good price
customer_reviews.text: She loved how cute they are she always asking for her plate everytime we sit to eat so its good enough for her then its good enough for me
customer_reviews.author: adalis garcia

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute product. Durable and well made. Only issue is the plastic coloring/picture starts to bubble up and come off after cleaning a few times.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute little set, my daughter loves it. There was a plastic sheet that came off after the first few washes. But it didn’t destroy the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a child over 2 years of age
customer_reviews.text: This is super small. I bought it for my almost 2 year old, but the plate portion of it does not hold much food and the ear sections are super small. Would not recommend for over 2 years of age
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Adorable set. My kids are Mickey and Minnie lovers so this was a hit. Just wish they were a bit larger. The ears don’t hold very much food.
customer_reviews.author: Jance

customer_reviews.title: Plastic peeled off plate after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Silverware and bowl have held up good. Plate, not so much. Xleaned as instructions say, but plastic xoating on plate started peeling off. Threw in recycling bin. Seems that's been a problem with other reviewers. Wouldn't gift it as plate only lasted a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Wilkewitz

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift/ First set for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Minnie Mouse and this was the perfect set to get her. Separately, I believe they would have cost more, but good thing it was bundled all together.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fun Dinnertime
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my great-nephew who has an obsession with Lightening McQueen. The colors are bright and the dishes are sturdy, which I expect will last for him to pass on to his own children one day.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves this dish set!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old granddaughter is a big Mickey Mouse fan, and she loves eating from her Mickey plate/ bowl! They are well made and durable. She uses this set every weekend while staying overnight and she is so cute when she gets her bowl and goes to the pantry and stands, letting me know she wants a snack! Very fair price from Amazon! Would recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Stott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a return gift on my son's 1st birthday. All kids were so happy. Quality is good. I will recommend this product to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Silambarasan Selvarasu

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable! My grandson LOVES eating with this set! He’s been a picky eater and slightly underweight according to growth charts but I’m noticing he eats a little more with this cute set. I’ve put in the dishwasher and they’re still just like new!
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Great grandgirl recieved for her 1st birthday & mom immediately washed & let her use them. Baby kept looking at them & smiling
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Decals forming bubbles. Not dishwasher safe?
customer_reviews.text: My child absolutely loves this set which is why it is so distressing that I followed the description and put it in the dishwasher. I can only assume that this is the reason the decal is lifting off the plate and the bowl. There are bubbles forming on both which allows food particles to slip underneath. Just wash it by hand and I think it would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute plate that holds up well over time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this over a year ago and it is still a beatiful.minnie mouse plate. It is my granddaughter's favorite plate.
customer_reviews.author: hrv

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: This set is a softer type plastic than the melamine plates that make up most character plates. My so. Loves his roadster Mickey plate, bowl and utensils.
customer_reviews.author: allthingsbeautiful

customer_reviews.title: Cute set at a good price. My mickey mouse lover son adores using ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute set at a good price. My mickey mouse lover son adores using these at meal time. The only complaint that I have it that I wish the mickey mouse ears on the "dinner plate" were slightly larger to fit different fruits or veggies in.
customer_reviews.author: Busymum

customer_reviews.title: Cute feeding set
customer_reviews.text: I scored based on visual because it’s a present so once it used after several times an accurate review can be given. It’s really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Lady J

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves her bowl and plate.  She is 3.
customer_reviews.text: The bowl works great. A bit of the picture scratched off on the plate, so wash with caution. The important thing is my Granddaughter loves the pictures and the utensils that accompanied the plate and bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Ironmonger

customer_reviews.title: Disney approved, quality
customer_reviews.text: Came in full plastic box, brand new, looked great! Dishwasher, easy to wash and use. Legit Disney brand made.
customer_reviews.author: Chelbel

customer_reviews.title: McQueen
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for the price. Most pieces are sold separately and cost a little more. It was a gift for my 2 year old. He loves the Disney Cars movies. He knows McQueen, Mater, Cruz, and Storm by name
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed and made
customer_reviews.text: The image on the plate isn't printed on, but is like a giant sticker. Unfortunately the clear sticker part began peeling off allowing water and food to get trapped inside. Since it seemed unsanitary to continue using it we had to toss it. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Christin J.

customer_reviews.title: ... brightly colored dining set for little kids make mealtimes fun and easy
customer_reviews.text: This brightly colored dining set for little kids make mealtimes fun and easy! My 20 month godson loves having his meals in this set, and always eats very well to be able to clean his plate and see the bight picture appear and he continues to eat. This set is very durable and withstands hand washings and dishwashings well
customer_reviews.author: Seashelly1

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Design Already Lifting
customer_reviews.text: The plate and bowl are adorable but the inner pictures are plastic decals and not painted directly on the melamine. Advertised as a dishwasher safe, they’ve been through the dishwasher 3 times (without use of heating element) and the design decals are already blistering and lifting. Now I have to take them away from a two-year-old who loves them...very disappointing! Fork and spoon are holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: italychic

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this set for months now and it is still looking good! I even put in the dishwasher most of the time and have had no issues with the picture coming off. My two year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Britney Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just love these sets! Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I love these sets I have several I think they're worth the price I'm not sure if they're microwavable or not but I always microwave mine (also put them in dishwasher) and nothing has ever gone wrong the kids adore them I'd recommend them to anyone
customer_reviews.author: LanieLou

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love everything disney. Super cute. Dishwasher safe. Sturdy & great price definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reinhold

customer_reviews.title: Eating is more fun!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a little one that likes Mickey Mouse this is a must have! Eating is more fun now that they have something that helps to encourage feeding/eating themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4 year old. He loves it so much and wow! The price shocked me with how great of quality it is!
customer_reviews.author: Kana Aino

customer_reviews.title: Reliable & sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the stickers on these dishes haven't come off yet! Hot, warm or cold food. I threw away ant boring plates or bowls that my son had and replaced it with this set. He eats and points out the cars and names at the same time lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delaminates
customer_reviews.text: After about a month and a half of regular use the plate has started to delaminate. Very disappointed three year old on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Toddler approved
customer_reviews.text: My son is all about cars and loves eating out of these. This was a good buy for us
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A “ Mickey Mouse” set that is petfect!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Our toddler grandson loves this set. Cleans earlier. Fork and spoon are easy for a toddler to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Making Dinner Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased to go with a birthday gift to a two year old who is infatuated with Minnie Mouse. Her mom says this is the only plate she wants to eat from and they have to wash it after every meal so it's ready for the next one! Very good quality and very reasonable pricing. It was a huge hit at her party. Would definitely recommend for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Adorable set, just be careful with dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Adorable set, just be careful with dishwasher. The plate started to wrinkle up in the middle. I would only hand wash the plate and bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Only giving it 4 stars because I haven't opened it yet! I wanted to show the packaging because I was concerned about packaging myself. But it looks like any other set you'd purchase from the store. Cute for any little Nemo/Dory lover!
customer_reviews.author: Kjw91

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby boy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves Mickey Mouse so this made a great gift. We are working on his skills to use utensils and he wants to use these. They are a perfect size for his tray on his high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Tracer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for mealtime
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has fun eating from this Minnie Mouse plate set. If it doesn't last as reviews say it will still have given her many fun meals. Her mom will wash it by hand. I am glad to see her happy at mealtime. Adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Thus is a super cute dish set i got for my 1 year old for Christmas. A gift he needs. He will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Frayah simone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Toddler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift for my 10 month old for Christmas this year. She loves Minnie Mouse! It seems like the perfect way to teach her to eat the correct proportions of food (i.e. meat to fruits to vegetables). I think it was a little on the expensive side for a plate and utensils, but I understand that it is comparably priced to its competitors at the same level of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Evans

customer_reviews.title: This came in a nice sturdy package which I am grateful for because I ...
customer_reviews.text: This came in a nice sturdy package which I am grateful for because I didn't want to have to figure out how to wrap it. It is so cute and the colors are really bright. I can not wait to give it to my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: xbead

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it, soft yet durable for toddlers. Will be buying more
customer_reviews.author: katesmama

customer_reviews.title: Nope

customer_reviews.title: The First Years Disney Baby Mickey Mouse
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my grandson who loves these Mickey Mouse plate, bowl, and utensils. They are very colorful and just the right size for him. He loves Disney Mickey Mouse.

customer_reviews.title: Peeling Plate
customer_reviews.text: While the product is really cute the main picture started peeling after 3 times of usage. The spoon and fork are a little too blunt so it’s hard for my toddler to pick up her food with it
customer_reviews.author: Cari DeLucci

customer_reviews.title: no slip grip that bums me out
customer_reviews.text: This product would be awesome if it had the rubber no slip grip at the bottom of each dish. We got some similar sets from IKEA and they were super cheap and had the rubber ring on the bottom that hold plate in place when toddler is eating. Bummed that I paid as much as i did and they are not even as good as the cheap ones I got from IKEA.
customer_reviews.author: Gtown Mama

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Peels
customer_reviews.text: The top coat/ plastic peeled off of this after 2 washes. I had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Minnie Mouse in charge!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little set for any Minnie Mouse fan. It was nice to get the flatware as well as the plate and bowl. It made a fun and appreciated gift for our granddaughter. The quality is good, weight nice, and colors vibrant. I should have gotten another set to keep at Nana's house!
customer_reviews.author: Margot Hellerman

product_meta.title: The First Years Disney Baby Minnie Mouse Feeding Set
product_meta.description:
Color:Minnie MouseDisney Baby Minnie Mouse Feeding Set has a lot of character and includes plate, bowl, fork, and spoon. Kids will look forward to meals with their favorite Disney friends. The sectioned plate provides a perfect place for finger foods, while the bowl has deep sides designed to make scooping easier. The stainless steel flatware has durable plastic handles that are easy to grasp. This baby feeding set is dishwasher and microwave safe and is made without BPA.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Microwave and dishwasher-safe, sectioned plate and bowl have deep sides for easy scooping. Break-resistant and lightweight. Divided plate for multiple food groups. Fork and spoon are generously-sized for easy feeding.
feature_bullets: FEEDING SET FOR KIDS: Sectioned plate, deep bowl and stainless steel flatware with Disney characters
MEALTIME SET: Dishwasher safe and made without BPA
EASIER SELF-FEEDING: Flatware set with easy grip plastic handles and deep bowl that makes scooping easier
